hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #gold#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: On second thought, let's not go to Hyrule Castle. 'Tis a silly place.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Saria's Song#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Enemy Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Map Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #Bombs (20 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #gold#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: I once glued a set of false teeth to the Boomerang.^${12 39 c7}That came back to bite me.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Blue Fire Arrows# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Shadow Temple#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Wallet#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Right Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.
